help-file.title: DIKUEDIT
help-file.content:
Duris has its very own zone editor called dikuEdit, created by Tavril. This allows zones to be created much easier if you are familiar with the Duris world, as it gives you both the look and feel of being in the MUD itself. For more information or to download it, visit http://duris.no-ip.com/ and click on DOWNLOADS. For a list of zones currently in Duris, type "credits". ========================================================================== See also: ZONES, "AREA MAKING"
# "DIMENSION DOOR" (Spell)
